attributes.action: Force Councils to collect more recyclable items at the kerb side,  which will reduce the amount of wate going to landfill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some local councils are doing the bare minimum in kerbside recycling - tins, paper and glass.  What is wrong with councils collecting more at the kerbside?, items such as plastic bottles/food trays, shoes, old clothing, cardboard etc.
Councils that collect the bare minimum are recycling about 18%, councils that collect the items listed above recycle 40%.
Councils must be bought into line, so that council A recycles the same items as council B, C and so on.  This will then take more items away from the landfill.
